channel.title: web development on Claudio Noguera
channel.description: Recent content in web development on Claudio Noguera

item.title: Jekyll is so nice!
item.description: I have moved my blog from a custom based solution to jekyll. What I was using was appengine and before that I had used wordpress. Wordpress doesn’t give you too much control. Of course you can configure it but it is so hard to do, I find PHP a nightmare and Wordpress’ API difficult to interact with. It was a pain doing plugins. It has one big advange though: it is easy to use for any user.
